ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] RE: Zanderion MIA?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Hi! Hehe too bad I didnt manage to see meet u so far after I return EQ.  I m hoping to get some lvl 50 lao jiao who has nothing to do after reaching 50 to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Hi!

Hehe too bad I didnt manage to see meet u so far after I return EQ. I'm
hoping to get some lvl 50 lao jiao who has nothing to do after reaching 50
to PL me abit ;) Think abt last time I used to help others lvl abit but
this time round only Les and Mas help so far. Guess the rest r busy with
the plane hunting? ;)

Yeah, I'm also very surprised to see pple booking date to hunt this, camp
that. I find it pretty rediculous. Unlike last time we can whack any
place we want (even have some KS fights with other players, still quite fun
whether we win or lose the KS fights), now I hardly see other members, esp
those high 40ish or lvl 50s, probably I'm too weak to join them for their
hunting too.

Zan, if u come back anytime, give us a guildsay spam, I kinda miss it
nowadays. Most of the perverts dun voice out much nowadays, hehe.

Ziltus

On Tuesday, 28 March, 2000 11:28 PM, Anson [SMTP:hannibal@...]
wrote:
> Hi everyone and especially to Ziltus :)
>
> I go MIA now and you come back? LOL
> This list seems to have goine quiet for some reason...hmm...
>
> Anyway for those wondering...yes i'm still alive and well thank you
> I've been very busy of late...work has gotten very time consuming as
> financial markets have
> been very active last few months..something's always happening. Also i've
> started a business of
> my own in a sense...it's still only a fledgling kinda busines...mostly
> freelance but basically i do hardware
> assembly and computer system sales..yeah it even comes with service
> hehe...yep thats it.
> With my real job and this start-up combined....i'm really drained of any
> spare time...it's certainly not enough
> time to go EQ and join in a slay the dragons night or something..barely 1
> hour free a night these days.
>
> Whatever free time i can spare usually goes to my girlfriend and yes some
> Unreal Tournament...man this is a GREAT game!
> Not too time consuming if you can't spare the time and yet a major
kickass
> fun game...especially CTF games.
> Anyone who plays UT on local servers pls contact me :) I use my nice
> Zanderion for UT as well.
>
> I might return to EQ given the time...who knows i might try ROK...not too
> sure though...sometimes i think
> EQ has become like a schedule...time to do this..book to do that..it's
> totally non-RPG anymore.
> I miss those days i could go hunt with some guys and not have to think of
> schedules and stuff...
> when since did knights and wizards in RPG have to book a date???? Totally
> crazy when you really care to admit it.
>
> Well i hope all of you are well and should anyone wanna buy a computer
> system...send me a mail :)
> Can give you guys some discount hehe..got all sorts of systems..high end
low
> end etc....
> So till next time..cya all and have fun!
>
> Zanderion
> mostly-retired lvl 50 magi on innorruk (till ROK at least)
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW [mailto:leekw13@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 3:00 PM
> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List'
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Need partner to lvl at WK (Innoruuk server)
>
>
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Hi guys,
>
> I've tested last night, from I login till I logout, I can solo both
Ulir
> and Ein at WK using DD and Jboot. However, the down time is too long
> (Ulir
> need 2.5 bubb mana on avaerage, and Ein need 4 bubb mana). The worst
case
> is I managed to kill Ein with OOM.
>
> Considering the long down time of mediating after taking every Ein, I
> invited a lvl 31 driud, helping him to snare Ulir for him to kite.
Then
> once he finish Ulir, I will start on Ein.
>
> This is a pretty good lvling method, as both of us enjoyed fast xp last
> night. Now I would like to invite any lvl 30ish member who can join me
> for
> training. I dun mind taking more fraction hits for snaring Ulir, coz
the
> loneliness is really driving me mad, esp when the perverts are not
online
> to spam the guildsay.
>
> Another alternative is another lvl 35-40 member, we team and take Ulir
and
> Ein together. Shouldn't be a problem, this method dun even need
kiting.
>
> So, anyone interested?
>
>
> Ziltus
> The lonely kiting pervert in WK
>
> p/s: My login time will be S'pore time 9pm till 1am. So guys, I'm
coming
> back for good. Any spare stuffs pls donate to me lah! ;P
>
>
